import React, { useEffect, useState, useContext } from "react"; import NavbarPage from "../components/navnew"; import Axios from "axios"; import "./post.css"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Chatbot from "../components/chatbot"; import Commentitem from "../components/commentitem"; import * as moment from "moment"; import "moment/locale/th"; import { Form, Col, FormControl, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { auth, googleProvider, facebookProvider, firestore, } from "../Frontfirebase"; import { object } from "yup/lib/locale"; import usercontext from "../context/usercontext"; import { MDBInput } from "mdbreact"; const { v4: uuidv4, NIL } = require("uuid"); const Post = () => { const [show, Setshow] = useState(); let { user, setUser } = useContext(usercontext); let { filteritem, Setfilteritem } = useState() let { facebook, Setfacebook } = useState() let { line, Setline } = useState() let { instragram, Setinstragram} = useState() let { twitter, Settwitter } = useState() let { other, Setother } = useState() let { result, Setresult } = useState() const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false); const onClick = () => setIsActive(!isActive); let history = useHistory(); // const handleclick = async() => { // Setclick(true) // } const ok = async () => { const getpost = await Axios.get(`http://localhost:7000/post/post`); Setshow(getpost.data.item); const getdata = getpost.data.item if(facebook || line || instragram || twitter){ Setresult( getdata.filter(doc =>{ return ( doc.social.toLowerCase().includes(facebook.toLowerCase()) || doc.social.toLowerCase().includes(line.toLowerCase()) || doc.social.toLowerCase().includes(instragram.toLowerCase()) || doc.social.toLowerCase().includes(twitter.toLowerCase()) ) }) ) } }; useEffect(() => { ok(); }, []); console.log(facebook) return (
แจ้งข้อมูลคนโกงได้ที่นี่เลย

{" "} มีโพสต์ทั้งหมด {show ? show.length : null} โพสต์

{show ? show.map((res) => { return (
{res.photoURL ? ( ) : ( )}
{res.username ? "@" : null} {res.username}

{moment( new Date(res.date.seconds * 1000) ).format("lll")}
ชื่อ - นามสกุลผู้โกง {res.name} {res.surname} เลขที่บัญชี (ผู้โกง) {res.accountnumber} ชื่อสินค้า {res.nameproduct}{" "} จำนวนเงิน {res.money} บาท วันที่โดนโกง {moment( new Date(res.datetimes.seconds * 1000) ).format("lll")}{" "} จำนวนครั้งที่ {res.name} {res.surname}{" "} ถูกแจ้ง{" "} {res.count} ครั้ง {" "} ยอดเงินรวมทั้งหมดที่โกงไป{" "} {res.summoney} บาท
( history.push(`/mypost/${res.uid}`), window.location.reload(true) )} > ดูเพิ่มเติม
); }) : null}
